thread.title_full: The Shorthaul – United – $194: Dallas – Belize City, Belize. Roundtrip, including all Taxes

author: Belize Hub
title: The Shorthaul – United – $194: Dallas – Belize City, Belize. Roundtrip, including all Taxes
text:
About Belize , Travel to Belize | August 1, 2015 by Belize Hub + | 0 Comments 
A good sale to Belize . Thanks to new service from Southwest to Belize, the hardest deal destination in Central America is now seeing a lot more reasonable fares. United is now attacking American’s fares to Belize. Availability is EXTREMELY limited – if you can make it work, enjoy. This will not last. 
What is The Shorthaul? It is our irregular feature of deals under $200 and 3,000 miles roundtrip. 
Belize City itself is probably not worth visiting. You probably want to visit one of the Cays or Islands. A popular one is Ambergris Caye — you can fly the local carrier Maya Island Air for between Belize City Int’l and Ambergris Caye. If you are part of a big group, it might be worth it to split a taxi and go to the Belize City Municipal Airport to fly to Ambergris Caye instead — based on our check, pricing is usually halved if you fly from there. 
English Caye, Belize – Photo: anoldent via Flickr , used under Creative Commons License (By 2.0) Sample Travel Date: November 14th – 18th Fare Availability: Valid for travel on in August, October, November . Must purchase at least 21 days in advance of departure This availability is only for non-overnight layovers. If you don’t mind overnight layovers, it is much much better – that is available from August – May, 2016 Please note that while this fare is valid at time of posting, if this post is more than two days old, the fare is likely gone. How to Search for Availability: Use ITA Software Matrix Airfare Search and use the following search criteria: Departing from: DFW Outbound Advanced Routing Code: iah /maxconnect 360 There is more availability with overnight layovers in Houston. We are instructing ITA to only search for same day connections. If you don’t care about the overnight layovers, remove the /maxconnect 360 part of the advanced routing code. Destination: BZE Return Advanced Routing Code: iah /maxconnect 360 (Click on Advanced Routing Codes link to enable advanced routing code input) Select “See calendar of lowest fares” Length of stay “3-10″ (This is just a sample, you can use any 7 day date range like 3-10, 7-14 etc)
